title: Convert to Exponential Form
text: We know that we're trying to determine x such that $$x=\log_{12}\left(144\right)$$. Rewrite this expression first into exponential form.

title: Determing the Exponential Form
text: What is the exponential form of $$\log_{12}\left(144\right)=x$$?

title: Rewrite 144 in terms of 12
text: How can we rewrite 144 in terms of powers of 12?

title: Solve for x
text: Substitution $${12}^2$$ into the exponential equation we found before, we get $${12}^x={12}^2$$. What is x?
